Name: Name
Ace_Greeting_1: Hey! Wanna play some soccer? Or at least pass the ball back if I kick it to you?
Ace_Greeting_2: Yo, you ever try scoring a goal against Garbanzo? He's got unreal defense.
Ace_Greeting_3: I swear, I was THIS close to breaking my juggling record. You believe me, right?
Ace_Greeting_4: Oh, it's you! Thought you were gonna be Isabella for a second, dodged a lecture on jaywalking!
Ace_Greeting_5: What's up? I'm warming up, wanna join? Or just stand there and admire my footwork?
Ace_Greeting_6: You know, I bet you'd be pretty decent at soccer if you practiced with me more. Just sayin'.
Ace_Greeting_7: Gotta keep moving! Standing still is for people who don't have dreams. Or at least, for people who don't have a soccer ball.
Ace_Greeting_8: Hey! Ever seen Garbanzo dribble? It's weirdly impressive. We gotta get him on a team.
Alex_Greeting_1: Hey there! Need a caffeine fix, or just here for the vibes?
Alex_Greeting_2: Welcome to Babbling Bean! What's your go-to drink?
Alex_Greeting_3: Morning! Or afternoon. Time kinda blurs together when you work with coffee all day.
Alex_Greeting_4: Hope you're not here for decaf' I mean, I'll make it, but I won't be happy about it.
Alex_Greeting_5: You ever just stare into your coffee and contemplate life? No? Just me? Cool, cool.
Alex_Greeting_6: If you're looking for something sweet, I *attempted* to bake again. No guarantees.
Alex_Greeting_7: Caffeine limit? What's that? Nah, I'm kidding. Sort of.
Alex_Greeting_8: If you need a pick-me-up, I got coffee. If you need life advice' well, I got coffee.
Amy_Greeting_1: Oh, hey! Are you staying hydrated? You should be.
Amy_Greeting_2: If you're here because something hurts, let's get it checked out.
Amy_Greeting_3: Please tell me you're here for a check-up and not because of another 'accident.'
Amy_Greeting_4: Feeling alright? You look fine, but I ask everyone just in case.
Amy_Greeting_5: If you want medical advice, I'm here. If you want life advice' maybe ask someone else.
Amy_Greeting_6: Try not to get sick, okay? This town has enough reckless people as it is.
Amy_Greeting_7: If you're here because you saw Esmeralda first' please, just don't tell me what she gave you.
Ava_Greeting_1: Hey, hey! What's the latest? Spill!
Ava_Greeting_2: Oh my gosh, you will NOT believe what I just heard!
Ava_Greeting_3: Got any juicy news? No? Okay, fine, I'll share mine first.
Ava_Greeting_4: Oh, it's you! Perfect timing'I was just about to tell someone something totally fascinating.
Ava_Greeting_5: If you need info, I got it! If you don't' well, you're getting it anyway.
Ava_Greeting_6: You look like you have something interesting to say! Or at least, I hope you do.
Ava_Greeting_7: Oh, don't mind me, I was just casually standing here' waiting to hear something fun.
Ava_Greeting_8: I swear, if I don't talk to someone soon, I might explode. Please, for my safety, chat with me!
Elijah_Greeting_1: Ah, another fleeting moment in the grand passage of time.
Elijah_Greeting_2: Mmm. Have you ever considered the impermanence of all things?
Elijah_Greeting_3: Oh, it's you. What brings you to this fleeting intersection of existence?
Elijah_Greeting_4: Words are but ripples in the vast ocean of thought. What is it you seek?
Elijah_Greeting_5: Hmph. A visitor. I suppose conversation is inevitable.
Elijah_Greeting_6: The weight of the world is light when one learns to let go. But I digress'
Elijah_Greeting_7: Silence is a virtue, but I suppose I can make an exception.
Elijah_Greeting_8: If you're here for small talk, I regret to inform you that I am ill-equipped.
Esmeralda_Greeting_1: Ah, you've arrived. Fate, or mere coincidence?
Esmeralda_Greeting_2: Hmm... I had a feeling you'd stop by.
Esmeralda_Greeting_3: Looking for something ordinary, or something... unusual?
Esmeralda_Greeting_4: Mmm, I see. The energies are shifting today.
Esmeralda_Greeting_5: Careful, traveler. Some answers come with more questions.
Esmeralda_Greeting_6: You seem well. Or perhaps, merely well enough?
Esmeralda_Greeting_7: A drop of knowledge, a pinch of mystery... what shall I offer today?
Garbanzo_Greeting_3: Teddy! No' wait, you're not Teddy.
Garbanzo_Greeting_5: Smells good! Is it food? I hope it's food.
Isabella_Greeting_1: Halt! State your business' just kidding. Or am I?
Isabella_Greeting_2: You're not up to anything suspicious, are you?
Isabella_Greeting_3: If you see anything unusual, report it to me immediately!
Isabella_Greeting_4: I've got my eye on you' and everyone else.
Isabella_Greeting_5: Do you believe in coincidences? Because I don't.
Isabella_Greeting_6: The town may seem quiet' too quiet.
Isabella_Greeting_7: Any leads on the case? No? That's exactly what they want us to think.
Isabella_Greeting_8: Stay alert. You never know who'or what'is watching.
Jacob_Greeting_1: Hey! Have you been hitting the gym? No? Well, there's no time like the present!
Jacob_Greeting_2: Fire safety and gains'two things I take very seriously!
Jacob_Greeting_4: You ever think about how life is like a bench press? You just gotta push through!
Jacob_Greeting_5: No fires today, which means more time for deadlifts!
Jacob_Greeting_6: Hydration and protein'two keys to success. You keeping up with both?
Jacob_Greeting_7: I don't just fight fires, I fight weakness! You in?
Jacob_Greeting_8: Strength isn't just physical'it's about discipline!
Jessica_Greeting_1: Hey! You ever just sit and watch the birds? They live such a simple life.
Jessica_Greeting_2: What's up? I just got off work'finally. Ronny runs a tight ship.
Jessica_Greeting_3: Thinking about the ocean again. One day, I'll see it for myself.
Jessica_Greeting_4: You ever wonder what's out there? Like, beyond this town?
Jessica_Greeting_5: Ronny's making me work an extra shift, but at least I get free food.
Jessica_Greeting_6: Oh, hey! Wanna help me figure out what kind of bird this is?
Jessica_Greeting_7: It's nice to just slow down sometimes, you know?
Mabel_Greeting_1: Oh, hello dear! Have you eaten today? I have some candies if you'd like one.
Mabel_Greeting_2: You remind me of someone' oh, never mind, it'll come to me later.
Mabel_Greeting_3: What a lovely day, isn't it? I love watching the town go by.
Mabel_Greeting_4: Do I know you? I feel like I should' Oh, well! It's nice to see you anyway!
Mabel_Greeting_5: Have you seen Will? He was just here a moment ago'
Mabel_Greeting_6: Come sit with me, dear. I have plenty of stories to share.
Mabel_Greeting_7: You look like you have a good head on your shoulders. Have I told you about the old general store?
Mabel_Greeting_8: Oh, I remember you! Or' I think I do. Either way, it's nice to see a friendly face.
Mark_Greeting_2: Welcome, take your time. I think I had a sale on' something. What was it again?
Mark_Greeting_3: Hey there! You ever think about how everything in life is just borrowed?
Mark_Greeting_4: If you're looking for something, I probably have it. Somewhere. We'll find it' eventually.
Mark_Greeting_5: Hey, do you need help or are you just here to bask in the silence?
Mark_Greeting_6: I was just about to take a break, but I guess I can work for a bit. What do you need?
Mark_Greeting_7: The universe provides, but a general store helps too. What can I get for you?
Mark_Greeting_8: If Amy asks, I'm very busy. If you ask, I'm chill. What's up?
Pattie_Greeting_1: Hello, sweetie! Can I get you something fresh from the oven?
Pattie_Greeting_2: Oh, hi there! You hungry? I've got plenty of treats!
Pattie_Greeting_3: Welcome in! What can I get you today? Something warm? Something sweet?
Pattie_Greeting_4: Hey, nice to see you! I just pulled some cookies out of the oven, interested?
Pattie_Greeting_5: Oh, if it isn't my favorite customer! Okay, I say that to everyone, but I mean it!
Pattie_Greeting_6: Come on in, sugar! I always have something good ready. Unless it's pie. Then no.
Pattie_Greeting_7: You look like you could use a snack!
Pattie_Greeting_8: Ah, just in time! I was about to take a break, but I can always chat with a friendly face.
Ronny_Greeting_1: Hmph. You again? What do you want?
Ronny_Greeting_2: Hope you didn't come looking for small talk.
Ronny_Greeting_3: You got something to say, or are we just standing here?
Ronny_Greeting_4: You want advice? Double the butter. Works every time.
Ronny_Greeting_5: Talk fast, kid. I'm not one for wasting time.
Ronny_Greeting_6: You checking in on me, or just lost?
Ronny_Greeting_7: Haven't scared you off yet, huh?
Ronny_Greeting_8: Alright, let's hear it. What's on your mind?
Teddy_Greeting_2: Unless you brought treats, I fail to see the point of this interaction.
Teddy_Greeting_3: Speak quickly. My time is valuable.
Teddy_Greeting_5: You may admire me, but please do so from a respectable distance.
Teddy_Greeting_6: I was in the middle of something' important. Probably.
Teddy_Greeting_7: You are, at best, a mild distraction. Proceed.
Will_Greeting_1: Ah, hello there! Always good to see a friendly face.
Will_Greeting_2: Oh! You know, this reminds me of a story' Oh, but where are my manners? How are you?
Will_Greeting_3: Welcome, welcome! How's your day treating you?
Will_Greeting_4: Ah, another fine day in Babel, wouldn't you say?
Will_Greeting_5: Good to see you! If you ever need anything, don't hesitate to ask.
Will_Greeting_6: Oh, you just missed Mabel'she was telling the most wonderful story. But tell me, how are you?
Will_Greeting_7: You know, this town wouldn't be the same without folks like you.
Will_Greeting_8: Ah, reminds me of the good old days! But enough about me, what's on your mind?
